model

Class MyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.MyModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class MyModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements Model
    MyModel Class extends observable and implements Model interface
    This class defines a problem(type of problem class) and a solution(type of solution class) data members

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MyModel()
      MyModel() Default C'tor. defines this.problem to a new Problem object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getSolution(int index)
      getSolution function is relevant only after running solveDomain function (Not relevant to GUI view!)
      void selectAlgorithm(java.lang.String algorithmName)
      selectAlgorithm will get algorithmName(String) and will set this.problem.algorithm to the given String
      void selectDomain(java.lang.String domainName, java.lang.String arguments)
      selectDomain - gets domainName(String) and arguments(String) that will describe its properties
      Sets this.problem.domainName and this.problem.arguments to the given params
      void selectHeuristic(java.lang.String heuristicName)
      selectHeuristic function -
      gets a String that will describe a heuristic method and will define this.
      void solveDomain()
      SolveDomain method is not relevant to GUI view. suitable for earlier modes (CMD)
      A request to solveDomain will initially try to start a connection with the server (according to xml properties)
      gets the instance of ProblemManager (singleTone)
      it will send the problem to the server and will get the catenated String which will describe the entire problem
      finally it will save the problem in the problem manager.
      void solveDomainAndDisplay()
      The solveDomainAndDisply method is relevant to GUI view!

      • selectAlgorithm

        public void selectAlgorithm(java.lang.String algorithmName)

        selectAlgorithm in interface Model

      • solveDomain

        public void solveDomain()
        SolveDomain method is not relevant to GUI view. suitable for earlier modes (CMD)
        A request to solveDomain will initially try to start a connection with the server (according to xml properties)
        gets the instance of ProblemManager (singleTone)
        it will send the problem to the server and will get the catenated String which will describe the entire problem
        finally it will save the problem in the problem manager.
        Specified by:
        solveDomain in interface Model

      • getSolution

        public void getSolution(int index)
        getSolution function is relevant only after running solveDomain function (Not relevant to GUI view!)
        Gets the problem's index in the problem manager hashMap and will. fetch the right problem from it.
        initialize connection with the server and sends the problem to the server in order to get solution.
        If the server can solve the problem - it will send it back to the client and this MyModel instance will save the solution inside this.solution.
        else, it will notify the observer.
        Specified by:
        getSolution in interface Model

      • solveDomainAndDisplay

        public void solveDomainAndDisplay()
        The solveDomainAndDisply method is relevant to GUI view!
        initialize connection with the server, send the problem to it and receive the solution using solveAndDisplay client's method. it will set this.solution to the received solution and notify the observer.
        Specified by:
        solveDomainAndDisplay in interface Model
